tool_description: Generates compelling property descriptions optimized for different listing platforms using property data and market insights.

property_data.description: JSON string containing structured property information

market_analysis.description: JSON string containing market comparison data

description_style.description: Writing style: professional, luxury, family_friendly, investor_focused

highlight_features.description: Specific features to emphasize in description

include_keywords.description: SEO keywords to include in description

error_messages: Invalid property data format: Property data must be valid JSON string
Invalid market analysis format: Market analysis must be valid JSON string
Unsupported description style: Must be professional, luxury, family_friendly, or investor_focused
Unsupported platform: Supported platforms are mls, zillow, realtor, facebook, craigslist
Character limit too restrictive: Minimum character limit is 100, maximum is 5000
usage: Provide structured property data and market analysis as JSON strings, then specify description style, target platforms, and optional highlighting preferences. Returns optimized descriptions for each platform.

platform_descriptions.description: Descriptions optimized for each target platform

headline.description: Compelling headline for the property listing

key_highlights.description: Bullet points of key property features
